类的使用
mapmodels.ErrorMsg

  • 使用ErrorMsg的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    gamemodels  
    mapmodels  

    • gamemodels中ErrorMsg的使用

      返回ErrorMsg的gamemodels中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ErrorMsg RiskGameModel.loadMapFile(java.lang.String inputFileName)
      The function to load the map file
      ErrorMsg RiskGameModel.playerTurn()
      The function to check the state of the current player's turn
      ErrorMsg PlayerModel.playTurn()
      The function to this player to play a whole turn, stop when finished or win the game
      ErrorMsg RiskGameModel.startGame()
      The function to start the game

    • mapmodels中ErrorMsg的使用

      返回ErrorMsg的mapmodels中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.addConnections(java.lang.String countryNameFrom, java.lang.String countryNameTo)
      Method to add connection between two countries.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.addContinent(java.lang.String continentName, int controlNum)
      Method to add a new continent.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.addCountry(java.lang.String countryName, java.lang.String continentName, int coordinateX, int coordinateY)
      Method to add a new country to an existing continent.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.changeControlNum(java.lang.String continentName, int controlNum)
      Method to change the control number of a continent.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.checkErrors()
      Method to check whether the map has errors, often called after successfully call loadMapFile method, concerning the connectivity of whole map and each continent, also report empty continents.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.deleteContinent(java.lang.String continentName)
      Method to delete a continent.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.loadMapFile(java.lang.String mapFileName)
      Method to load map file data into defined data structure, get ready for further validation for errors and warnings.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.moveCountry(java.lang.String toContinentName, java.lang.String countryName)
      Method to move a country to another continent.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.removeConnection(java.lang.String countryNameFrom, java.lang.String countryNameTo)
      Method to remove the connection between two countries.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.renameContinent(java.lang.String continentName, java.lang.String newName)
      Method to rename a continent.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.renameCountry(java.lang.String countryName, java.lang.String newName)
      Method to rename a country.
      ErrorMsg RiskMapModel.saveToFile(java.lang.String mapFileName)
      Method to save map to a file, need to call checkErrors() and checkWarnings() firstly, failed due to file operation errors.
